Package it.polimi.se2019.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpawnPlayer
    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information related to the player, necessary to the state of the game. Supports cloning into another instance to save current progress of the player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int actionCount
      Stores how many actions have been made by the player in current turn
      private java.util.List<Action> actions
      List of available actions the player can choose
      private ThreeState alive
      Represent the status of the Player; when transitioning and at the end of the turn, the Controller will respawn the player accordingly to the rules.
      (package private) java.util.List<Ammo> ammos
      Owned ammos by the Player; there can't be more than three for each color No Ammo.POWERUP is allowed into the Set
      private Color color  
      private java.util.List<Player> damages
      Ordered list of damage tokens received, represented by players who gave them
      private boolean dominationSpawn
      True if the player is in fact a spawnpoint
      private boolean firstPlayer
      Whether the player is the first player in the game.
      private boolean firstShotReward
      Whether the player deserves the reward for first shot.
      private boolean frenzyActions
      True if player is in frenzy mode
      private boolean frenzyBoard
      True if player board has been flipped after starting frenzy
      private java.lang.String id
      Unique identifier of the Player
      private java.util.List<Player> marks
      Ordered list of marks received, represented by players who gave them
      private Match match  
      private int maxActions
      Max number of actions that the player can use in its turn
      private Tile perspective
      Virtual position of the player, used to make some effects possible
      private int points
      Current total score
      private java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUps
      PowerUps cards owned by the Player
      (package private) java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> rewardPoints
      Ordered list of reward points given to other players if player dies
      private Tile tile
      Real position of the Player
      private java.lang.String token
      Authentication token saved in this format: {username}$salt${HMAC(password+salt)}
      private VirtualView virtualView
      Virtual View of the player
      private java.util.List<Weapon> weapons
      Loaded and unloaded weapons owned by the Player

      • receiveShot

        public void receiveShot​(Player shooter,
                        int damage,
                        int marks,
                        boolean convert)
        Add given number of damage given by shooter Convert marks related to the shooting player in damages Add given number of marks given by shooter Change available actions of the receiving player accordingly Synchronized to avoid instant powerup with MOMENT.DAMAGED activation
        Parameters:
        shooter - player who shoots
        damage - number of damages to add
        marks - number of marks to add after converting the existing marks

      • addPowerUp

        public boolean addPowerUp​(PowerUp powerUp,
                          boolean limit)
        Add powerUp to powerUps if:
      • limit if False
      • powerUps size is less than three
Parameters:
powerUp - powerup to add
limit - if limiting or not to three the size of powerUps
Returns:
true if the powerup is added, false if it gets discarded

  • discardPowerUp

    public void discardPowerUp​(PowerUp powerUp,
                           boolean award)
    Discard the powerUp and add the corresponding ammo
    Parameters:
    powerUp - powerUp to discard from powerUps
    award - true if discard award should be added to player ammos

  • hasPowerUp

    public boolean hasPowerUp​(Moment applicability)
    Returns true if the player has a powerUp which can be used at the given moment
    Parameters:
    applicability - the moment in which the player can use the powerup
    Returns:
    true if the player has the corresponding powerup false otherwise

  • canDiscardPowerUp

    public boolean canDiscardPowerUp​(java.util.List<Ammo> cost)
    Returns true if the player has at least one powerup that can be discarded to pay for the cost
    Parameters:
    cost - the ammos the player has to pay
    Returns:
    true if the player can pay at least one ammo with a powerup false otherwise
